org.apache.flink.runtime.executiongraph

Interface ExecutionStageListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultScheduler

    public interface ExecutionStageListener
    This interface must be implemented in order to receive a notification whenever the job has entered a new execution stage.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void nextExecutionStageEntered(JobID jobID, ExecutionStage executionStage)
      This method is called to indicate that the job with the given JobID has finished its previous ExecutionStage and has entered the next ExecutionStage.

    • Method Detail

      • nextExecutionStageEntered

        void nextExecutionStageEntered(JobID jobID,
                             ExecutionStage executionStage)
        This method is called to indicate that the job with the given JobID has finished its previous ExecutionStage and has entered the next ExecutionStage. Note that a notification is not sent when the job has entered its initial execution stage.
        Parameters:
        jobID - the ID of the job the notification belongs to
        executionStage - the next execution stage that has just been entered
